author: Special Correspondent
text:
Silver anklets and other jewellery totally weighing about 45 kg were seized by election officials during vehicle checks at Thiruvanaikovil in the city on Tuesday evening.

According to sources, the anklets and other jewellery were being transported in a car from Salem for a jewellery shop in Tiruchi but those who were carrying it did not have proper documents.

Later, the anklets were taken to the Srirangam Tahsildhar office and handed over to treasury authorities for safe custody.
title: 45 kg silver anklets seized
